downloadTitle: STS Integration Paper using WS-* Protocols
downloadDescription: These documents detail the agreement for STSs to Interop with Azure Active Directory using the WS-Federation and WS-Trust protocols

downloadFile.name: STS Integration Interoperability Scenario Requirements July 2015.pdf
STS Integration Paper using WS Protocols Feb 2016.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/3/7/9/379ff864-ac01-4cf1-8130-b34708c713bd/STS Integration Paper using WS Protocols Feb 2016.docx

detailsSection: There are three documents in this download associated with interoperability for the Works with Office 365 - Identity program. First is the paper that details the agreement for STSs to Interop with Azure Active Directory using the WS-Federation and WS-Trust protocols. The second is the paper which specifies the scenarios for STS testing that Microsoft use for qualification in the Works with Office 365 - Identity program. The third is the program guide for partners for the Works with Office 365 - Identity program. This enables use of a third party Identity Provider to be used for authentication by Office 365 and other Microsoft services that use Azure Active Directory.
detailsSection_file_name: STS Integration Interoperability Scenario Requirements July 2015.pdf
STS Integration Paper using WS Protocols Feb 2016.docx
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Word is required to view the papers and to download the embedded sample XML files.
installInstructionSection: Download and read the documents. Implement the required protocols. Obtain qualification from the Works with Office 365 - Identity program for the Identity Provider.
